analysis.description:
Reentrancy in SoccerChampion.supportTeam (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#403-418):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_internalToken.balanceOf(msg.sender) >= amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#406-407)
	- _internalToken.originTransfer(this,amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#413-415)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tournaments (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#418)

QIUToken.ownerTransferFrom uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(tx.origin == owner) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#284-285)

QIUToken.originTransfer uses tx.origin for authorization:
	- require(bool)(_value <= balances[tx.origin]) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#304)
team in SoccerChampion.createNewTourament (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#398) is a local variable never initialiazed
ticket in SoccerChampion.supportTeam (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#412) is a local variable never initialiazed

SoccerChampion.supportTeam (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#403-418) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_internalToken.originTransfer(this,amount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#413-415)

SoccerChampion.endTournament (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#510-540) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-_internalToken.ownerTransferFrom(this,ticket.supportAddres,actualGainAmount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#535-537)
	-_internalToken.ownerTransferFrom(this,owner,tournamentSupportAmount.sub(totalClearAmount)) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol)

SoccerChampion.endTournament has external calls inside a loop:
	- _internalToken.ownerTransferFrom(this,ticket.supportAddres,actualGainAmount) (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#535-537)

QIUToken.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#263-264)
QIUToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#262-263)
QIUToken.eth2qiuRate should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#264-265)
QIUToken.name should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#259-261)
QIUToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#262)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/15/0xa342b71ef080fd75a78251aa83d3f5ce80743939.sol#148) is not in mixedCase
